#summary Changing bbPress Role Display Name
#labels Featured,P-RoleDisplayName

=Introduction=

Quick and simple way to change roles' display names.

_Please also read *[http://code.google.com/p/llbbsc/ this page]*_

=Download=

==Quick way==

Download [http://llbbsc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/bbPress/RoleDisplayName/role-display-name.php role-display-name.php] only.

==Subversion way==

Run `svn checkout http://llbbsc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/bbPress/RoleDisplayName/ RoleDisplayName`

=Installation=

  * Modify the display names in `role-display-name.php`.
  * Upload it to `my-plugins`.
  * Activate it.
  * Done.
